attributes.action: Allow pubs to have a licence for the 'Nail Wood' game
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst travelling in Europe, a group of friends came across a unique brand of pub game - 'Nail Wood'. Ingenious Europeans had acquired a heavy log and placed in a pub. Said Europeans then supplied nails and a hammer. The aim of the game was to hammer a nail into the log, hence, 'Nail Wood'.

I have yet to play this game because of the archaic British rules about pubs, nails, wood and hammers.

Petition the PM to licence this adrenalin packed pub game.

WARNING: CREATOR OF PETITION NOT LIABLE FOR ANY INJURIES SUSTAINED THROUGH PEOPLE ATTMEPTING TO PLAY ILLEGAL 'NAIL WOOD' AT HOME.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
